review: I got this because I'm tired is paying $40/year for Xbox Live!  I got this today and it's amazing, way better than Xbox 360 for Netflix and Amazon instant video.I love the remote and you can download an Amazon Fire Stick app to use your phone (I'm using android) as a remote too!  This is pretty awesome.  It also comes with a HDMI extension in case your TV can't take the stick directly plugging into the HDMI slot for space/physical reasons.  I thought I'd have to buy one but I am so glad they included it!So far is super fluid and without lag watching Amazon video.  I love how you have options for closed captioning, you can adjust font size and color.you can set parental controls for purchases and setup options using a 5-digit pin - perfect for our house of kids.I'm still keeping my Xbox 360 for non online gaming plus I can plug the USB cable from the Amazon fire stick into my Xbox for power.  Just ignore the insufficient power notification - for me it works great.
